subject: TIEMPO-360: Correction -- Express BE is OFF, BEAF is the only backend
body:
Hey Fulton,

Quick correction to my earlier messages. El Gotan confirmed: the Express BE (calendar-be) is no longer running. BEAF is the sole backend.

This means the gaps I identified are even more critical -- there is NO fallback backend populating masteredCityId on regular event create/update. Everything depends on BEAF Events.js getting the venue lookup + mastered location inheritance right.

To recap what's needed in BEAF:

1. EventsSummary.js: Replace masteredXXX grouping with coordinate grid bucketing (msg 003)
2. Events.js regular create/update: Add venue lookup to populate masteredCityId, masteredDivisionId, masteredRegionId, venueGeolocation, and masteredCityGeolocation (msg 004)
3. Venue create/update: Ensure nearest masteredCity is assigned to new/updated venues
4. BEAF TEST health: Multiple 500s across endpoints (events, venues, health, mapcenter-track)

I've updated the CLAUDE.md docs on our side to mark Express BE as deprecated.

Thanks!
- Sarah
